Equate Witch Hazel Astringent (2019 formulation)

Brand: Equate

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Active Ingredients: WITCH HAZEL 86.0%; Inactive Ingredients: ALCOHOL 14% BY VOLUME

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
